mapper.insert: insert into message (message_id, works_name, visit_name, mstatus, create_time, update_time, editor, message, createman, spare) values (#{messageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{worksName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spare,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update message set works_name = #{worksName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visit_name = #{visitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mstatus = #{mstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, editor = #{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, message = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createman = #{createman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spare = #{spare,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where message_id = #{messageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select message_id, works_name, visit_name, mstatus, create_time, update_time, editor, message, createman, spare from message where message_id = #{messageId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by create_time desc
select message_id, works_name, visit_name, mstatus, create_time, update_time, editor, message, createman, spare from message order by create_time desc
select message_id, works_name, visit_name, mstatus, create_time, update_time, editor, message, createman, spare from message where works_name like "%"#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
